Banner.Description: An experienced and highly skilled Business Analyst with a strong track record of delivering successful projects and driving business process improvements for the past 3 years. A versatile professional who excels in collaborating with cross-functional teams, including business users, project managers, and development teams, to define project objectives and deliverables. A proactive and detail-oriented professional, constantly seeking opportunities to optimize processes, increase efficiency, and achieve business goals.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: As a dedicated and passionate Business Analyst, I commit to the continuous improvement and staying updated on the latest technological advancements helps me identify innovative solutions that drive operational efficiency and enhance business performance. I am highly adaptable and thrive in fast-paced, dynamic environments, where I can utilize my skills to make a tangible impact.

Overall, I am a results-oriented professional who is dedicated to leveraging my expertise to support the strategic goals and objectives of an organization, while also nurturing a collaborative and positive work environment.

Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: DHL
Responsibility: Build and maintain effective relationships with clients and stakeholders.
Facilitate conversations with stakeholders to identify needs and create requirements.
Ensure client satisfaction and gather feedback for continuous improvement.
Monitor and measure the feature performance.
Support UAT with test cases and data.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Orient Software
Experience.Jobs.Description: bravoSUITE strives to be the all-encompassing ERP system that provides a full cycle of intelligent HR and personnel management solutions for the enterprise.
Responsibility: Collect and research the business needs by the demand of the product orientation and feedback.
Devise change strategies and recommend the optimal solutions.
Inspect and conduct the gap analysis against the competitors in the market.
Design wireframe, compose the models (by using UML) and document for requirement communication.
Work closely with the development team to ensure requirements alignment and successful implementation.
Present the demo with the relevant stakeholders and provide aid in training after release.
Measure the release performance metrics and act accordingly with the result.
Take Scrum delegation role in hosting events, facilitating communication, and crafting the Product roadmap with the technical base.

Experience.Jobs.Title: BOSCH
Experience.Jobs.Description: CI-CAT is a GUI desktop application circulated within the enterprise that provides end-users with a handy set of controls that manage BOSCH global domain resources (e-mail, user account, etc ...) by connection to Active Directory Domain Services and Exchange Server.
Responsibility: Implement new features and fix the existing defects.
Take part in analysing requirements and eliciting the needs of stakeholders through open points.
Provide remote technical support to customers via e-mail and Q&A meeting sessions.
Manage and create release details on business documents.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
